Ray of Sickness Tips & Notes for BG 3

Upcast: Cast at higher levels deals an extra 1d8 Poison damage for each Spell Slot Level above 1st. Poisoned: Disadvantage on Attack Roll and Ability Checks.

Lvl 1 Spells Animal Friendship ♦ Armour of Agathys ♦ Arms of Hadar ♦ Bane ♦ Bless ♦ Burning Hands ♦ Challenge
